mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(id, user_id, email, password, name, phone_number, birth, auth_key, auth_status, address, created_at, updated_at) VALUES(NULL, #{userId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birth}, #{authKey}, #{authStatus}, #{address}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE users u SET auth_status = 1 WHERE u.email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND password = #{password}
